snp1.4:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava magadhesu viharati dakkhinagirismim ekanalayam brahmanagame.
snp1.4:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena kasibharadvajassa brahmanassa pancamattani nangalasatani payuttani honti vappakale.
snp1.4:1.4: Atha kho bhagava pubbanhasamayam nivasetva pattacivaramadaya yena kasibharadvajassa brahmanassa kammanto tenupasankami.
snp1.4:1.5: Tena kho pana samayena kasibharadvajassa brahmanassa parivesana vattati.
snp1.4:1.6: Atha kho bhagava yena parivesana tenupasankami; upasankamitva ekamantam atthasi.
snp1.4:2.1: Addasa kho kasibharadvajo brahmano bhagavantam pindaya thitam.
snp1.4:2.3: “aham kho, samana, kasami ca vapami ca; kasitva ca vapitva ca bhunjami.
snp1.4:2.4: Tvampi, samana, kasassu ca vapassu ca; kasitva ca vapitva ca bhunjassu”ti.
snp1.4:3.1: “Ahampi kho, brahmana, kasami ca vapami ca; kasitva ca vapitva ca bhunjami”ti.
snp1.4:3.2: “Na kho pana mayam passama bhoto gotamassa yugam va nangalam va phalam va pacanam va balibadde va.
snp1.4:3.3: Atha ca pana bhavam gotamo evamaha:
snp1.4:3.4: ‘ahampi kho, brahmana, kasami ca vapami ca; kasitva ca vapitva ca bhunjami’”ti.
snp1.4:4.1: Atha kho kasibharadvajo brahmano bhagavantam gathaya ajjhabhasi:
snp1.4:10.1: Atha kho kasibharadvajo brahmano mahatiya kamsapatiya payasam vaddhetva bhagavato upanamesi:
snp1.4:10.4: yanhi bhavam gotamo amatapphalam kasim kasati”ti.
snp1.4:13.1: “Atha kassa caham, bho gotama, imam payasam dammi”ti?
snp1.4:13.2: “Na khvaham tam, brahmana, passami sadevake loke samarake sabrahmake sassamanabrahmaniya pajaya sadevamanussaya, yassa so payaso bhutto samma parinamam gaccheyya, annatra tathagatassa va tathagatasavakassa va.
snp1.4:13.3: Tena hi tvam, brahmana, tam payasam appaharite va chaddehi appanake va udake opilapehi”ti.
snp1.4:14.1: Atha kho kasibharadvajo brahmano tam payasam appanake udake opilapesi.
snp1.4:14.2: Atha kho so payaso udake pakkhitto ciccitayati citicitayati sandhupayati sampadhupayati.
snp1.4:14.3: Seyyathapi nama phalo divasam santatto udake pakkhitto ciccitayati citicitayati sandhupayati sampadhupayati;
snp1.4:14.4: evamevam so payaso udake pakkhitto ciccitayati citicitayati sandhupayati sampadhupayati.
snp1.4:15.1: Atha kho kasibharadvajo brahmano samviggo lomahatthajato yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavato padesu sirasa nipatitva bhagavantam etadavoca:
snp1.4:15.3: Seyyathapi, bho gotama, nikkujjitam va ukkujjeyya, paticchannam va vivareyya, mulhassa va maggam acikkheyya, andhakare va telapajjotam dhareyya, ‘cakkhumanto rupani dakkhanti’ti; evamevam bhota gotamena anekapariyayena dhammo pakasito.
snp1.4:15.4: Esaham bhavantam gotamam saranam gacchami dhammanca bhikkhusanghanca,
snp1.4:15.5: labheyyaham bhoto gotamassa santike pabbajjam, labheyyam upasampadan”ti.
snp1.4:16.1: Alattha kho kasibharadvajo brahmano bhagavato santike pabbajjam, alattha upasampadam.
snp1.4:16.2: Acirupasampanno kho panayasma bharadvajo eko vupakattho appamatto atapi pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva—yassatthaya kulaputta sammadeva agarasma anagariyam pabbajanti, tadanuttaram—brahmacariyapariyosanam dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja vihasi.
snp1.4:16.3: “Khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattaya”ti abbhannasi.
snp1.4:16.4: Annataro ca panayasma bharadvajo arahatam ahositi.
